testSteps.description: Given Bestbuy Application is running in the background
When I send a PUT request to update product detail
And I update name, type, price, shipping, upc, description, manufacture, model, url, image

children.description: Updating product with ID : 9999710, name : Duracell - AAA Batteries (4-Pack)46916_updated,type HardGood89035, price: 5.49, shipping: 0, upc: 041333424019, description: Compatible with select electronic devices; AAA size; DURALOCK Power Preserve technology; 4-pack, manufacture: Duracell, model: MN2400B4Z,url: http://www.bestbuy.com/site/duracell-aaa-batteries-4-pack/43900.p?id=1051384074145&skuId=43900&cmp=RMXCCand image: http://img.bbystatic.com/BestBuy_US/images/products/4390/43900_sa.jpg
